00035 #include "btkSphericalHarmonics.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 // STL includes
00039 #include "cmath"
00040 
00041 namespace btk
00042 {
00043 
00044 const Real SQRT2 = std::sqrt(2);
00045 
00046 Real SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(Direction u, unsigned int l, int m)
00047 {
00048     if(m < 0)
00049     {
00050         Real coeff = SQRT2 * std::sqrt( (Real)factorial(l+m) / (Real)factorial(l-m) );
00051 
00052         if(m%2 != 0)
00053             coeff = -coeff;
00054 
00055         return coeff * (Real)legendrePolynomial(l,(unsigned int)-m,u.theta()) * (Real)std::sin(-m*u.phi());
00056     }
00057     else if(m > 0)
00058     {
00059         Real coeff = SQRT2 * std::sqrt( (Real)factorial(l-m) / (Real)factorial(l+m) );
00060 
00061         if(m%2 != 0)
00062             coeff = -coeff;
00063 
00064         return coeff * (Real)legendrePolynomial(l,(unsigned int)m,u.theta()) * (Real)std::cos(m*u.phi());
00065     }
00066     else // m = 0
00067         return (Real)legendrePolynomial(l,(unsigned int)0,u.theta());
00068 }
00069 
00070 Real SphericalHarmonics::legendrePolynomialInZero(unsigned int l)
00071 {
00072     Real odd = 1;
00073 
00074     for(unsigned int k=1; k<l; k+=2)
00075         odd *= k;
00076 
00077 
00078     Real even = 2;
00079 
00080     for(unsigned int k=2; k<=l; k+=2)
00081         even *= k;
00082 
00083 
00084     Real frac = odd / even;
00085 
00086     if((l/2)%2 != 0) // l/2 is odd
00087         return -frac;
00088     else // l/2 is even
00089         return frac;
00090 }
00091 
00092 unsigned int SphericalHarmonics::factorial(unsigned int n)
00093 {
00094     if(n < 2)
00095         return 1;
00096     else
00097         return factorial(n-1) * n;
00098 }
00099 
00100 Real SphericalHarmonics::legendrePolynomial(unsigned int l, unsigned int m, Real theta)
00101 {
00102     Real pmm   = 1;
00103     Real x     = std::cos(theta);
00104     Real somx2 = std::sin(theta);
00105     Real fact  = 1;
00106 
00107     // pmm(n) = pmm(n-1) * -fact * sin(theta)
00108     for(unsigned int i=1; i<=m; i++)
00109     {
00110         pmm   = pmm * (-fact * somx2);
00111         fact += 2;
00112     } // for i
00113 
00114     Real Plm;
00115 
00116     if(l == m)
00117         Plm = pmm;
00118     else // l <> m
00119     {
00120         Real pmmp1 = x * (2. * m + 1.) * pmm;
00121 
00122         if(l == m+1)
00123             Plm = pmmp1;
00124 
00125         else // l < m OR l > m+1
00126         {
00127             Real pk = 0;
00128 
00129             for(unsigned int k=m+2; k<=l; k++)
00130             {
00131                 pk   = (x * (2. * k - 1.) * pmmp1 - (k + m - 1.) * pmm) / (k - m);
00132                 pmm   = pmmp1;
00133                 pmmp1 = pk;
00134             } // for k
00135 
00136             Plm = pk;
00137         } // else l < m OR l > m+1
00138     } // else l <> m
00139 
00140     return Plm;
00141 }
00142 
00143 } // namespace btk
